alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 3:37AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and central and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 8 PM This Evening to 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures above freezing may initially limit accumulations to grassy, elevated surfaces Monday evening. By Tuesday, snowfall rates are likely to increase, and snow is likely to be heavy at times. Isolated power outages are possible. Gusty winds could produce periods of blowing snow, mainly across higher elevations.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
